website_summaries.verdict: Inexpensive shaker bottle that includes all of the basic features you'll need to create your own protein shakes.
pros: This style of blender bottle is available in multiple colors
Includes a high-quality metal blender ball to help you mix your shakes properly
Has a large capacity of 28 oz
cons: Some bottles may leak while shaking
bottles, can only fill to 20 oz

customer_reviews.title: Questionable quality
customer_reviews.text: Lids cracked and made the blender bottles unusable in less than 1 month of use.
customer_reviews.author: Paul waynetska

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Kinda big, but works great. I have been using a battery operated mixer that sucks up battery juice after a few uses. If you want to go green - this mixer is a big plus. Also, price is incredibly reasonable for the pair. I use this for mixing "Amazing Grass Green Superfood" which is impossible to stir with a spoon. A few shakes with this blender bottle and it's done. Going to order the smaller size which is more suitable for me.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C

customer_reviews.title: Works great, easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Blends powders beautifully and lump-free, and just rinses clean -- no difficult areas to reach even if you're making a shake with something obnoxious and sticky. I shake everything up, then pour it into a glass and immediately rinse the shaker. These let me do a quick kill-the-sweet-tooth chocolate protein shake in the wee hours without the noise and mess of the blender. I never would've dreamed a stainless wire ball could make that much difference, but it does. These are big and roomy, too. I usually use about 10 oz. milk with protein powder, green powder, and cocoa, plus 3 ice cubes (that don't fully melt, just chill everything down), and when shaken the container is nearly full.
customer_reviews.author: Random Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Product is great, but they seem to ship random colors.
customer_reviews.text: I like the product. They are very durable and the old pair I had worked well. I tend to use them as a drinking container at my computer rather than a shaker cup. The lids are a little bit of a hassle if anything gets stuck in the top snap, but nothing an old toothbrush won't fix before popping in the dishwasher. I decided to order two more and found a color pack that I liked. Package arrived today and I have two totally random colors. I don't even see this color combo as an option to order. Overall, good product but be wary if you want specific colors.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Best Blender Bottle I've Tried
customer_reviews.text: I take protein shakes twice daily and hated the hassle of using our blender to make them, but was frustrated with the quality of other mixing bottles I've tried. After I used these at my brother's house I bought four of them right away and love them. I usually mix whole milk, one or two whole raw eggs, and two scoops of whey protein powder, and these blend them perfectly. There are never any unblended chunks or clumps. They don't leak during shaking, they're very easy to clean, and the loop on the lid can be used to hang them from a backpack or coffee mug hook.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Baye

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Item
customer_reviews.text: My wife used to go to work without eating breakfast. By the time lunchtime rolled around, she was obviously starving...not the ideal situation nutritionally or for her health. She purchased a couple of these blender bottles and not makes a protein shake to take with her to work in the morning. She has something to "eat" for breakfast and isn't starving by the lunch hour. They're dishwasher safe (top shelf only) and the stainless steel blender ball goes into the silverware caddy. Easy to clean and re-use. A WINNER!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I buy this brand all the time
customer_reviews.text: I like these Blender Bottles a lot. I buy them in different colors and the two sizes. They can go in the dishwasher. I have not had any issues with putting them in the top part of the dishwasher again and again. They never leak and they are tough plastic. The colors are pretty. The only issue I have at all with them is that if I have an icy cold drink it will get condensation on the outside. So I always set it on a coaster or a folded paper towel. They are such good quality that they are worth that little extra.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Great Cups. :(  Poor Packing Department.
customer_reviews.text: I do Love these cups. I use them for water at home, at work. My kids use them at school. They are perfect. The only reason I gave 3 stars is because I ordered the colors "turquoise and purple". And I got "blue and green". The only reason I'm not sending them back is because I don't have time for replacing them. I needed them the day I ordered them so I'll deal with the colors, there really not bad colors anyway. I don't have the green one with me right now but here is a photo of the blue one.
customer_reviews.author: ERINN

customer_reviews.title: Good but not as pictured... beware
customer_reviews.text: Blender bottles came on time, packing was done well. Bottles seem to be good quality but time will tell. When I purchased the order I went off of the picture of what the bottles would look like. One bottle came just as pictured, clear with a black top other was a maroon/pink color with dingy yellow accents .. not happy about the color change as both bottles were purchased for men... both bottles were supposed to be clear. With only colored lids..
customer_reviews.author: victoria

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE these shakers!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these shakers. I'm so glad I went with Blender. They really are they best out there. These shakers look and feel expensive. High quality bottles. I love the stainless mixer ball. Just be careful not to set it in a dish rack after washing, or it might get stuck! I love the 2 pack deal. I mix up my pre and post workouts so they're just ready to grab before and after working out. I couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Fax Chequer

customer_reviews.title: Faulty Closure
customer_reviews.text: I am a novice when it comes to protein shakes, so my expectations may have been too high for this product. The top closure on these bottles never worked correctly. I have to be extremely careful about where I place the product to make sure I do not spill protein shake everywhere. Additionally, when assembling the shake, I have to cover the top with a towel to make sure that shake doesn’t spill everywhere when vigorously mixing product together.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Dukes

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I like these blender cups I got the double set one for me one for my wife I've had friends that have used these for quite some time and overall they've been happy and the company has a long history I stand by it I like it and I will continue to use the products I'm looking to see if I should purchase the blender cup with the round bottom so my supplements don't stick to the corners inside the cup
customer_reviews.author: Paris

customer_reviews.title: Perfect random colors!
customer_reviews.text: I took a chance with the random colors and got an all red one which is my favorite color so I am very pleased! The ball is really the part that can’t be beat and it is everything I needed and I do have a bottle I bought elsewhere without the loop so this is an added bonus and my keys clip right onto it. Even the black and yellow I dig because it reminds me of Batman!
customer_reviews.author: Brigid S

customer_reviews.title: Solidly Built, Mixes Well & Leak Proof
customer_reviews.text: These are more solid feeling than I expected--very well made. Lid screws on easily and cap snaps shut with a reassuring snap. You can safely shake away without concern for any leakage. And the shaker with the wire ball makes short work of my protein powder drink. I find that cleaning is simply a matter of rinsing; though I do clean with dish soap now and again...just because. Highly recommended. Can't think of one ding!
customer_reviews.author: Angst

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price when you purchase these as a 2 pack. I go through these regularly since like anything plastic they will eventually leak over the course of a year or so when used regularly. Blender Bottle makes the most durable shaker cups, however. I use these when traveling and regularly at the gym 6 days a week for protein shakes, pre workout, and itra workout water mixed with ultima electrolytes.
customer_reviews.author: run2088

customer_reviews.title: Color varies
customer_reviews.text: These did not come in the color in the photo which I guess is stated somethwgere in the advertisement that colors vary. The colors I received were super ugly. I got a red/black and yellow/black like the entire bottle was this harsh ugly red color and an ugly yellow. I was expecting the bottles to at least be clear. I returned them and bought some at the store.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline Heeter

customer_reviews.title: It Came From Within...
customer_reviews.text: I love blender bottles... I buy them every few years... this I just bought recently and it completely busted... it was routine use, so not sure if I got a crappy rendering from the factory but I'm super disappointed because these should be a more durable then falling apart with regular usage... Beeare
customer_reviews.author: NATALIA H.

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I had 2 blender bottles, one was not the BlenderBottle brand and leaked, the other was the BlenderBottle brand and didn't so I bought 4 more. I use them to make our KETO Chow in and store in the refrigerator. Great, durable product.
customer_reviews.author: Just Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money! No leaks and colors are as shown!
customer_reviews.text: Came as promised and look exactly as pictured. My son and I both use them every day. We have not had any issues with leaking or damage. The seal is very tight so no leaks but you do have to pop it open each time. This is a blessing and a curse as it can then occasionally let whatever is on the lid splatter a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya D.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Powder Drink Mixer
customer_reviews.text: These are the best cups I've found for drinking powder-based shakes. Pro Tip #1: Put a few ounces of water into the cup before you pour in the powder - that way the powder doesn't get stuck onto the bottom, and instead mixes cleanly inside of the cup. Pro Tip #2: Wash the cup just like you make a drink: Fill half way with hot water, add soap, add the metal doodad, close it and shake!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Worg Great, but sent me the wrong colored bottles
customer_reviews.text: They work as they should and work great. They blend up the protein powder with no clumps left behind. They don't leak even after washing them in the dishwasher :-) I ordered the clear ones to make it much easier to see where the water line in the bottle. They sent me the wrong ones. They sent the dark colored bottles that make it much harder to see the water line for me. Minus one star for sending the wrong thing. Outside of that they work as they should and work great.
customer_reviews.author: Online Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Good price and work well
customer_reviews.text: I have actually bought these twice (one set of clear with black lids and the blue & purple set). It is cheaper to buy the two pack than to buy them in stores. I use these almost every day both for just water and for protein shakes after workouts. They work well, just make sure you screw the lids on properly otherwise they can leak (but once you put the lid on correctly they hold water perfectly!). I would recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: R.L.

customer_reviews.title: Not clear cups :/
customer_reviews.text: Got different colors other than pictured, although it DOES say colors may vary— I thought they meant mostly the lids. I like clear because I can see that they are clean, but now I have 4 flaming fuschia opaque cups. Oh well. Won’t return them on this basis—just FYI. Also hate pink despite being female lol
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Great Bottle
customer_reviews.text: These bottles work really well and are easy to clean. Have been using them for a little over a week, and no leaks so far. The only reason I didn't give them 5 stars is because it's extremely difficult to read the measurements listed on the bottle. Other than that, they work well.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey L.

customer_reviews.title: Love blender bottles!
customer_reviews.text: I love blender bottles. They are the best. Perfect for mixing up protein drinks for breakfast or taking some soylent powder on the go. I have several blender bottles in different sizes. Easy to mix, easy to clean, and I haven't had any issues with leaks.
customer_reviews.author: cocoabutter

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Pleased with these shakers. The lid is tight enough that I can throw it in my bag without worrying about it leaking on my stuff. Cleans up easy in the dishwasher with no issues. And it fits in my cars cup holder perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can’t go wrong with Blender Cups.
customer_reviews.text: These are great all around and exactly what you would expect. I bought the 12oz 2pack first then got these bigger ones. I use them every day. No leaks. Durable, and the ball mixes everything really well. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: MariaAna

customer_reviews.title: When they say “colors may vary”, they aren’t kidding
customer_reviews.text: I mean the product itself is great, but wtf? I figured this meant it may not look exactly like the picture, not that it would be a complete different color. I ordered clear bottles, one with a black lid one with the plum lid. Got all red and black/yellow lol.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Found these by accident - LOVE THEM!
customer_reviews.text: I have never had such durable drinking bottles. The handy carrying ring is wonderful. I have used them for all kinds of drinking fluids and they have NEVER spilled. These bottles are easy to clean and do not seem to hold odors (sour milk). It was awful, but is cleaned very well. I will buy more, as needed.
customer_reviews.author: NJohnson

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color
customer_reviews.text: I have been working out in a awhile, and my old shaker git broken. I have to replace a new one and found these. I have ordered the black ones, but when they delivered to me they gave me yellow & red shaker. I didn't like it but I kept it anyways cause it's gonna take me more time and waste time if I bring it back. Next time check the orders carefully.
customer_reviews.author: Arlyn

customer_reviews.title: Picks up smells and lid doesn't stay shut but overall pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: I use one daily and these are pretty good. The lid doesn't stay closed so not totally leak proof if it gets knocked over. I dies pick up smells (vitamin drinks and protein drinks) so wash with a little bleach and make sure you can let air out between uses.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Broadway

customer_reviews.title: These are great! Except one was as pictured, and one was a weird salmon opaque color.
customer_reviews.text: I like these better than the shakers that come with Isagenix orders, but you get luck of the draw on color. One was clear transparent with a black lid as pictured, and one was an opaque strange pinkish orange color. If you're picky, you may not like the loss of color control. For me, it was fine and does the job. The spout is a bit hard to close - be sure to give it an extra push or you'll regret it like I did - but it's designed this way to provide the security needed when shaking, or carrying it on a belt or backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Classic design. Best shaker bottle on the market
customer_reviews.text: I've had several of these over the years and I love them. They last for years, and they clean up super easily in the dishwasher. No more protein powder clumped at the bottom of the bottle for your after-workout shake. My first blender bottle lasted me about 10 years before I accidentally crushed it in my gym bag. I keep about 3 on-hand so I've always got a clean one.
customer_reviews.author: Darren

customer_reviews.title: Leak proof and non toxic!
customer_reviews.text: Bought the pack of two and we use them all the time. As long as you close them and hear the click, they won’t leak. They are bpa-free, which is also the reason we bought them. They are not insulated, which is good because we like to drink water at room temp. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mary D.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband. Every morning he fixes himself a protein shake and these work great. The lid snaps on tight for shaking and the metal ball helps with the mixing. I also like the colors. I’ve bought four of these so far and plan on buying a few more.
customer_reviews.author: Katt

customer_reviews.title: Love these bottles
customer_reviews.text: I love blender bottles. I'm undergoing gastric bypass and these cups do well with mixing my protein shakes. They'll be a huge part of my life. I own 4 now and plan to buy more. Leak proof and come in cute colors and designs.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Winders

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Gym
customer_reviews.text: These have been great so far for me. I throw them in my gym bag and they're super durable at the gym. I can't count how many times I've dropped or knocked them over on accident and not even a scratch on them, let alone or a crack.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great products!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I use it to make carnations instant breakfast for the kids and works great!! I wash it on the top rack of the dish washer or hand wash. Easy to clean, easy to use and no leaks while shaking it around.
customer_reviews.author: silly monkey mommy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality bottles
customer_reviews.text: We love these bottles. My husband uses them daily and they go back forth between his work and home...ie dropped, forgotten about, left in the car, etc. They don't leak, are easy to open and close and hold up well to going through the dishwasher often. Happy with this brand
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and perfect for protein shakes
customer_reviews.text: I make morning and pre-workout shakes in these. The measuring lines are helpful as I pour 2 cups of almond milk up to the line. Drop in a couple scoops of protein powder and the little wire mixing ball and shake for about a minute. Shakes are always smooth and don;t have any 'powder bombs' in them. The mouth opening cover has a sort of click to it when you press down hard which really feel like it makes a sturdy seal. So far I have never leaked a drop from the cover or mouth opening while shaking. Definitely recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Great shaker, difficult to seal
customer_reviews.text: The shaker does exactly what I needed it to do. My other shaker was catching my protein powder and making protein balls in the lid which were so difficult to clean out. I have had a few instances of the lid not closing easily, but that may just be user issues.
customer_reviews.author: Z. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Love These Shakers
customer_reviews.text: I own several versions of this shaker (different styles, different sizes - all by Blender Bottles, about 6 total). They are all great shakers, strong, and dishwasher safe. The only issue is cleaning where the top of the bottle meets the lid but that is pretty much all shakers that have this problem.
customer_reviews.author: PH_Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice bottle. Screwtop so easier to close and make sure that it's closed. Ball might be difficult to clean but it's stainless steel so less chance of powders sticking to it. Bought a discount model so not sold on the colors but small price to pay. Love the carrying loop
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I hated the colors I wanted clear bottle with black and the other with pink like in picture instead got a all red bottle not what I wanted and a clear with yellow and black oh well my husband already used the clear one with yellow and black and I hate the all red still new
customer_reviews.author: Valeria Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Good quality blender bottles
customer_reviews.text: These are the high quality bottles I was hoping for. The only reason I knocked off a star from 5 star was that instead of receiving the 2 clear/black bottles that I thought I was getting, I received 1 clear/black and 1 all black. I need to see the contents and measurements when I mix my drinks, so I always get the clear bottle, and don't really care what color the top is. Other than that, the shipment was delivered on time and in good shape.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Deceptive marketing, but good nonetheless.
customer_reviews.text: Work well. Deceptive marketing as mentioned in other reviews. I'd give these 5* if actually 28oz in the markers. My initial shock to see how small they were really bummed me out, but for $16, they do a good job regardless
customer_reviews.author: DoYuEvenCarry

customer_reviews.title: Color raffle!
customer_reviews.text: They work, they don't leak, they were not even close to the colors I ordered. Selected black and purple and was sent blue and pink. Really, pink? It does what it's supposed to though but won't order these ones again. If you're not going to send what is selected, why give an option?
customer_reviews.author: Tara Marie

customer_reviews.title: It says "colors may vary" but it's NOT even close to the color you chose.
customer_reviews.text: We chose 2 clear cups.. one with a Black/Blue lid and one with a Purple lid. It wouldn't have been too bad to receive two clear cups with different colored lids.....but we got the brightest Santa Clause Red you've ever seen for both the bottle and lid. I understand this is fairly petty, but red is my least favorite color so it makes it that much more annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Weak Lids
customer_reviews.text: I have owned 20 different blender bottle products, and maybe this is just a weak batch, because the lids on these ones don't have that same satisfying click that reassures me that they are truly closed. I havent had a leak yet, but I miss the clicking sound from my other bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I have a black one and I loved making my smoothies. I had to get me another one to replace for meals a day. These are so easy to clean and totally leak proof. I use mine for meal replacements, energy drink mix, electrolyte mix, etc...I got the pink & peach color. SO CUTE!!!
customer_reviews.author: FS

customer_reviews.title: They have held up very well, easy to clean too
customer_reviews.text: I have had them for a long time now, they are still very nice. I gave the green one to my husband and I kept the purple one. We use them daily, they are super easy to clean. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: ugliest colors possible
customer_reviews.text: Blender bottles aren't cheap, last forever and I use them a lot so decided to buy this inexpensive version to add a couple more. They are fine, they are BlenderBottles but they are the ugliest colors ever imaginable. I think the vendor must have ordered a color and the manufacturer messed up bc I haven't seen bottles this color anywhere - ever!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Is the color important to you?  Or performance?
customer_reviews.text: I loved the mixing ball in it’ but it did not seem to hit the bottom very well. I only used it once, but will continue. Oh don’t stress over the color you want, you probably won’t get it, I know I didn’t and others warned me too.
customer_reviews.author: JustJNL

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these cups! I use them daily. One for water 24/7, one for shakes and smoothies. They are super easy to clean, and still look brand new! I will definitely be buying more...thanks blender bottle!!!
customer_reviews.author: Molly McKeever

customer_reviews.title: Love these things
customer_reviews.text: No matter what gym you go to i guarantee you see people with these bottles! i figured i would give them a shot because the price is good enough to try em out, and i do not regret it one bit! word of advice though clean them out as soon as you are done as stale protein is no bueno!
customer_reviews.author: Sargent Dude

customer_reviews.title: Can freeze smoothies
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my veggie & fruit smoothies, as I needed something that would be easy to clean (small bottlenecks don't come clean). Added bonus: I can freeze my smoothies in these containers! This makes it super-easy to make all of my smoothies for the week on Sunday afternoon, and just freeze them for the week.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Great blender bottles that doesn't leak if...
customer_reviews.text: Great blender bottles that doesn't leak if... Just make sure you use the lid with the same bottle because for some reason the lids if you swap them around dont always fit a different blender bottle. For example I have two the same color and I had to mark the lid and the bottle with a sharpie 'A' and 'B' so I know what lid went with which bottle. If you do that, you will get no leaks. Switch lids, and you may or may not.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Winger

customer_reviews.title: Well made and convenient.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't leak, let's you make a shake without cords or batteries, whisk ball does a pretty good job, but won't replace your Nutribullet...it's not really designed to do that. If you want to make a shake with just your protein powder, it's fine. Two shakers is handy. Always a clean one available.
customer_reviews.author: David S.

customer_reviews.title: Good mixing
customer_reviews.text: Good product. This combination pack is great for being able to have two different bottles for all your needs. Typical blender bottle that you will see at any vitamin shop. The lids screw on easy but be careful not to over-tighten them because they will crack. It is natural instinct to tighten something as much as you can when you're about to shake the crap out of it but it seals good so there is no need to screw it on like Hulk. Wire balls keep their form and do a great job of mixing. Pros: Lightweight Ounces are marked on the side Wires keep shape Cons: Cap can crack if over-tightened
customer_reviews.author: C. D. Koehler

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The product is what you would expect for blender bottles. Shipping is fast and definitely worth the money as you can use the bottles at the gym, work, or at home. I bought the value pack as I lose these bottle frequently.
customer_reviews.author: David Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: Pay attention when ordering. Each choice has different colors combos and I was interested in the black and purple combo not realizing that for this option it was actually “colors may vary.” I ended up getting two random colors which I don’t particularly care for. Not worth the hassle of returning.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured.
customer_reviews.text: Not as pictured. Got a black one and a clear one with black lid when I selected a clear one with black lid and clear one with purple lid. For most people, it wouldn’t matter, but we selected these because we color code or bottles in our home.
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: Love Blender Bottles! Bought 2 packs!
customer_reviews.text: We have had many off brands of blender bottles and the original is hands down the best. Amazon has the best price by far and this two pack is great! We have washed in the dishwasher multiple times and still looks brand new! Also blends our Arbonne shakes well so there aren't any clumps of powder. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Natashawh

customer_reviews.title: Weak, both bottles broken after barely a year
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in November of 2014. Not too much to say about it -- it's a water bottle with a ball inside it to mix everything up. And it works well, until it breaks. One came out of the dishwasher in an unusable state, the other has developed a crack around the top of the threads. I treated these things well (minimal top-rack dishwasher use, never in any sort of gym bag), yet they didn't last Pros: Blends protein shakes Cons: Not (as mentioned in the description) dishwasher safe No (as shown in the picture) loop on the back of the bottle Not by any means durable or long-lived My advice: save your money and find something more reliable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Find!
customer_reviews.text: The price was great and these are wonderful mixer bottles. The cap is tight and the lid snaps on tight so you will not have any dripping at all! I plan to stay with this brand now that I found it!
customer_reviews.author: L. Layton

customer_reviews.title: Love-love-LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know the science behind this little metal ball in this shaker bottle, I just wish I had created it! No more clumping up, no residue, no fragments left at the bottom. And if you're thinking it all depends on the protein powder you use it works on them all. I've used shakeology in this bottle and that stuff is THICK and it worked great in this shaker bottle. The bottle is well made and not flimsy like some. The flip cap snaps on firmly and you don't have to cover it w/ your hand while shaking...it holds firmly in place. I use it daily and have not been disappointed yet.
customer_reviews.author: C. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Deluxe, supplement shaker upper
customer_reviews.text: Classic blender bottle. Just about as standard as they come. If you are looking for a deluxe, high speed shaker bottle keep looking; if you are looking for an inexpensive, supplement shake- upper look no further! Blender Bottle is brand name, includes shaker ball and is dishwasher safe. Hope this review was helpful! Let me know if you have any questions!
customer_reviews.author: The Fair Critic

customer_reviews.title: Works great, blends well
customer_reviews.text: Works great, I love it and use it every day. I have a sensitive nose it picks up a smell after 3 months of all day drinks with sucralose products, don't leave drinks in it for extended periods of time. Pop top sometimes doesn't seal all the way sometimes, make sure you hear the click or you will get covered in drink
customer_reviews.author: Ryann

customer_reviews.title: They leak
customer_reviews.text: The colors are great and I was pleased when I first got them. The problem is I put in a powdered drink and water and when I shook it it does not seal . Two of the four that I purchased word defective and leak. I would not purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Karen S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these almost every day since I purchased them. I swap out others I find just to try them and none compare! Never leak, perfect size, wide opening. Just great!
customer_reviews.author: Seamripper

customer_reviews.title: Our go to brand
customer_reviews.text: We have tried other bottles but Blender has always worked best for us. A while back we had one break while tightening the lid but since it was a store bought version I will just put that as a warning since the lid sometimes feels like it doesn't close all the way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer-TR

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have used daily since I have received for my protein shakes . I take them to work and they have not leaked in my work bag even on its side. Great product would recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great set and color!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my husband and I. We have shakes often and were tired of the constant cleaning of our ninja blender so with this and the shaker ball it makes it easier for those mornings you want to save time or are running late 👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Zapata

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: From previous purchases I knew this would be a good bottle. It is. Leak proof and nice design. I got a colored one and a clear one. Don’t really care about the color.
customer_reviews.author: D L Roach III

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my protein shakes !
customer_reviews.text: Loved these bottles, purchased the double pack and gifted one of the bottles and kept one for myself. It’s a quick and easy way to mix my protein shakes. Easy to measure and I love the fun colors. Also easy to wash, I only handwash mine, not sure if it is dishwasher safe or not.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Ulrich

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Works great, having multiple colors is fantastic if you have multiple people in your household who are going to be using these. Tip: make sure the mixer ball is in the bottle before adding fluid/powder, it mixes way better that way.
customer_reviews.author: Hanzo186

customer_reviews.title: No leaks!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. The pour cap fits VERY VERY tight which is good so it won’t leak BUT it can be a nail breaker trying to get it open. I love it though cuz I know it’s not going to leak while I’m shaking.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma S

customer_reviews.title: Lids Keep Cracking!
customer_reviews.text: I have now purchased about 6 blender bottles and every single one the lid has cracked and no longer holds liquid. The lid cracks along the edge in the same exact place. Just keep wasting it thinking it was my fault, but it keeps happening in the same place. Guess I'll look for something else to mix my protein drinks. Sucks because these are perfect if only they wouldn't break! Oh, and it always happens conveniently 30 days after purchase so I can't return it. Blender Bottle, figure out how to make a better lid.
customer_reviews.author: Sienna

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I wanted two clear ones but I got one clear and one red. I like to see what I'm mixing up and if it's mixed well. Anyhoo they're good bottles.
customer_reviews.author: KJB

customer_reviews.title: Shaken - not stirred
customer_reviews.text: My favorite bottle on the market. The size is great. I love the 2-pack because I use one solely for water and the other for smoothies. Having the shaker ball to mix everything comes in handy for protein drinks.
customer_reviews.author: CJOY98

customer_reviews.title: Durable, pleased
customer_reviews.text: Durable, not cheaply made. nice colors. Product exactly as described & just what I needed to make my matches green tea!!
customer_reviews.author: George Belch

customer_reviews.title: Blender Bottle works Great!
customer_reviews.text: The Blender Bottle works great. The lid snaps on with no leakage and the loop holder makes it easy to use a clip and attach it to a backpack or a strap for carrying. I use it for infused water, juice and smoothies. Doesn't quite fit in my car's cupholder however.
customer_reviews.author: Christine S.

customer_reviews.title: Hard to clean, leaking lid
customer_reviews.text: The lid has to be held shut for travel or mixing. (No lid lock) No part has any thermal insulation. Just a cheap plastic cup. Cleaning is difficult as the main cup is too small for my hand to fit in
customer_reviews.author: K. Oshea

customer_reviews.title: Does not leak liquids
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I bought these a few months ago and they are still going strong! The caps lock tight. You feel assured if the bottle tips over there will be no leaks. We’ve yet to experience any spills while shaking our liquids. The colors are pretty and true sellers picture. They last in the dishwasher too.
customer_reviews.author: Eleeson

customer_reviews.title: They came so fast!
customer_reviews.text: Although the didn’t get a purple one with a purple lid, no matter. I still got 4 new cups to fit the amount of water/milk & protein powder I will be using.
customer_reviews.author: N. Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Best blender bottle I’ve ever owned!!! DISH WASHER SAFE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used name brand blender bottles before and nothing comes close to the quality in this cup! I can put my pre-workout in 2 minutes before I start working out and give it one or two shakes and it is perfectly blended! I recommend this product to anyone who want a great blender for cheap!
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: These work great and no leaks when shaking
customer_reviews.text: These bottles are great for mixing powder drinks or fiber supplements. The lids seal well with no leaking. They hold 16 oz of water. Colors are great. They wash well. I have one at work and one at home. They are cheaper than at Target.
customer_reviews.author: CMD

customer_reviews.title: They work & they last without holding any odor nor staining
customer_reviews.text: They work great & they last. Clear is best to see what's going on inside. There has been no staining after extensive use nor odors.
customer_reviews.author: Where There's a Will, There's a Way

customer_reviews.title: Durable is an understatement
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't happy with the consistency of my smoothie, so I dumped it back in the blender for another go round. As I blended in my, I heard recurring tapping/crunching sound. Huh, must be some ice in crushed in there, i thought. When I poured it back in the bottle, I realized in horror I had blended the shaker ball. AMazingly, the ball suffered no damage other than some light scratches. In other words, this bottle is tough. Looks and feels built to last all-around.
customer_reviews.author: Derek P.

customer_reviews.title: Durable and leak proof
customer_reviews.text: Make sure to close the drinking cap until it clicks or you’ll spray water all over the place when shaking :) Great product. Doesn’t leak, durable, easy to clean, easy to drink of.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Baker

customer_reviews.title: Very nice but sometimes hard to close.
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice but occasionally leak. You get false positive lock and if you don’t crank it down it leaks. I’ve had it explode a few times in my gym bag both dry and wet. Not fun to clean.
customer_reviews.author: HK

customer_reviews.title: Great blender bottle
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift. Recipient loved them & says they work pretty well. The blender balls do pretty good at mixing the contents, but they don’t always get every clump out. My only complaint that warranted 4 stars was that I was sent the wrong colors but I already shipped them (a gift) before I noticed, so I wasn’t going to return.
customer_reviews.author: Daniil Zavulunov

customer_reviews.title: Big cups, cute colors
customer_reviews.text: Big enough for my breakfast smoothies, and come in cute colors. Seal is tight, but takes a bit of a whack to get the actual flip-lid to snap on fully. After that, zero worry about leaking, and handle makes it easier to carry when my hands are full.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Compton

customer_reviews.title: Great as Blender Bottles always are!
customer_reviews.text: Just like other Blender Bottles, these ones work great! The are made of a great material, they're durable, and easy to clean. No complaints here! Even loved the random color choices!
customer_reviews.author: ajroets

customer_reviews.title: Blends well; easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: We have several style shaker bottles, but you really can't beat the BlenderBottle. The wire ball inside does a good job of agitating the water enough to evenly mix everything. Better yet, it's dishwasher safe.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great shaker. Keep a few extras on hand so you always have a clean one ready!
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. Just to clarify ... Shaker does NOT leak if you ensure that you secure the top tightly by twisting it well (but not excessively tight). Easy to clean by hand. I recommend having at least 4-5 of these on hand in times when you will get lazy and need one quickly when heading out the door. Great for shakes on the go, pre or post workout shakes or aminos etc.
customer_reviews.author: Mike K

customer_reviews.title: Great bottles!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I take my protein shakes to work everyday!!!! They don’t leak at all. You just have to make sure you snap the lid down till you hear it click. Then you know it’s sealed tight!!! I throw my in my dishwasher too!!!
customer_reviews.author: Hollywood

customer_reviews.title: Great Bottles
customer_reviews.text: I will never try to mix my protein shakes with a fork again. These bottles are awesome. Easy to carry around. Easy to mix together the contents. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: My fav water bottle for the gym
customer_reviews.text: Bought new ones because its my favorite bottle for the gym. But I dropped it just right And the lid cracked. Did not like that i couldn't cover my colors. But that's ok
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Simmerson

customer_reviews.title: Good mixing Cups, Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Good value. I go though bottles a lot and when i see a deal i jump on it! They appear to be good quality and sturdy. The lids are almost too sturdy. Hard to close all the way and open too. The finger loop hook thing is nice to have. I usually just snag my cup with a finger that way. They haven't broken yet so i am happy!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan P.

product_meta.title: BlenderBottle Classic Loop Top Shaker Bottle, 28-Ounce 2-Pack, Colors May Vary
product_meta.description: Color:Colors May Vary| Size:28ozThe 2-pack of BlenderBottle Classic 28-Ounce Shaker Cups makes it easy to maintain proper nutrition and hydration on-the-go. While one dishwasher-safe bottle is getting clean, there’s another on hand for mixing protein shakes, smoothies, fiber drinks, and meal replacements. Featuring a patented mixing system, the 316 surgical-grade stainless steel BlenderBall wire whisk (found only in BlenderBottle brand shaker cups) moves freely inside the bottle to smooth out drink mixes and meal ingredients. It’s also a handy kitchen tool for mixing pancake batter, scrambled eggs, and salad dressings. The wide mouth makes it easy to add scoops of powdered mixes, meal ingredients, and liquids, and embossed markings show both ounces and milliliters for easy measuring anywhere (note that markings on the 28-ounce capacity shaker cup only go up to 20 ounces). Bottle contents and liquids are securely contained thanks to a tightly threaded screw-on lid that creates a leakproof seal, and a flip cap that snaps securely shut for shaking and transportation. The convenient loop top makes it easy to carry the bottle and offers a place to attach car keys while at the gym. The BlenderBottle Classic 28-Ounce Shaker Bottle can also be used as a water bottle; the ball can be left inside, as it will never rust, chip, or peel. Includes two, 28-ounce BlenderBottles. BPA and phthalate-free, dishwasher safe. Manufacturer’s limited lifetime warranty.
feature_bullets: Pack of two, 28-ounce capacity (note: measurements only go to 20 ounces) shaker cups for mixing protein shakes, smoothies, and supplements
Patented mixing system uses 316 surgical-grade stainless steel BlenderBall wire whisk found only in BlenderBottle brand shaker bottles
Screw-on lid creates leak-proof seal, and flip cap snaps securely shut to keep contents contained; loop top for easy carrying or attaching keys
Wide mouth makes it easy to add mix scoops and liquids, and embossed markings measure both ounces and milliliters
Includes two shaker bottles; BPA and phthalate-free, dishwasher safe; manufacturer’s limited lifetime warranty

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars6,757 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
